name: Notre-Dame de Paris
des: The tragic love story of the hunchback Quasimodo and the beautiful Esmeralda set in medieval Paris.

name: Vingt mille lieues sous les mers
des: Captain Nemo's underwater adventures aboard the Nautilus as he explores the mysteries of the ocean.

name: The Three Musketeers
des: An iconic adventure about friendship, bravery, and loyalty, set in 17th-century France.

name: Notre-Dame de Paris
des: The tragic tale of Quasimodo, Esmeralda, and the cathedral of Notre-Dame, set in medieval Paris.

name: Brave New World
des: A society obsessed with consumerism and control, where individuality is forbidden.

name: The Count of Monte Cristo
des: A man wrongfully imprisoned seeks revenge in this gripping tale of betrayal, justice, and redemption.

name: Vingt mille lieues sous les mers
des: An underwater odyssey aboard the Nautilus, led by the enigmatic Captain Nemo.

name: Roadside Picnic
des: A profound and unsettling exploration of the aftermath of an alien visitation, focusing on a 'stalker' who navigates a mysterious and dangerous Zone.

name: Aşk ve Gurur
des: A Turkish retelling of Jane Austen's classic tale of love and prejudice, focusing on the dynamics of love and class in a contemporary Turkish setting.

name: Les Misérables
des: An epic tale of love, justice, and redemption in post-revolutionary France.
